metadata.title: CVE-2016-2516 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
NTP before 4.2.8p7 and 4.3.x before 4.3.92, when mode7 is enabled, allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (ntpd abort) by using thesame IP address multiple times in an unconfig directive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.3').
